name: Falafel with Canned Chickpeas
author: Dani
summary: Falafel made with canned chickpeas - just like the ones you taste in a Greek restaurant. Makes about 12 patties. Serve with hummus or tzatziki sauce.
ingredients: 1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
directions: Mash chickpeas in a bowl using a masher
Combine mashed chickpeas, onions, parsley, and garlic in a blender and blend until smooth
Mix eggs, cumin, coriander, salt, lemon juice, baking powder, black pepper, and cayenne together in a bowl
Add chickpea mixture and mix together
Add bread crumbs slowly and combine using your hands until mixture isn't sticky, but will hold together when frying
Heat oil over medium-high heat in a skillet
Form mixture into about 12 patties about as wide as the palm of your hand
Fry patties in the hot oil until browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side
